name: Moving Around
description:
Hi! And welcome to the game. You cannot move around right now, but you sure will soon...

In this game you will be part of the creation of a first-person platformer, with a lot of interesting ways to move. It would be boring though to have to many of those, so even though there are 11+ movements, at any time you won't have more then seven...

I want to thank my friend for playtesting and making the icons and the banner for this game! Thanks.
